name: A Very Fishy Game
description:
Blop Blop Blop - local fish

Almost better than live fish - my mom

Remember, a dead fish can float downstream, but it takes a live one to swim upstream. - W.C. Fields

The best way to observe a fish is to become a fish. - Jacques Yves Cousteau

Loved the game... It was... Hm... I forgot - Dory

The fish game that got the nation swimming!

Ever wanted a fish tank but never got it?
Dive into a wonderful fish watching experience with our survival simulation - A Very Fishy Game.

**The crew:**

Coding by *Hilllego*

Art, Animation and Music by *Puzmak*

**Programs used:**

Gamemaker 1.4,
Bfxr,
Procreate,
Garageband

**Additional resources:**

Fonts:
Coder's crux, Chequered Ink,
Aldi font by Phil Goodwin,

Bubble sound by Glaneur de Sons.
